abstract: The Potash Corporation slammed a report that favors BHP Billiton’s $39 billion offer for the fertilizer maker over a potential bid from a state-owned Chinese entity.
snippet: The Potash Corporation slammed a report that favors BHP Billiton’s $39 billion offer for the fertilizer maker over a potential bid from a state-owned Chinese entity.
lead_paragraph: The Potash Corporation slammed a report commissioned by the province of Saskatchewan that favors BHP Billiton‘s $39 billion offer for the fertilizer maker over a potential bid from a state-owned Chinese entity.

headline.main: Potash Slams Report on BHP Takeover Bid

abstract: Rio Tinto said it has made no decision on its planned $116 billion joint venture in Australia with BHP Billiton, after a report said that “the biggest merger in Australian business history is dead.”
snippet: Rio Tinto said it has made no decision on its planned $116 billion joint venture in Australia with BHP Billiton, after a report said that “the biggest merger in Australian business history is dead.”
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto has made no decision on its planned $116 billion joint venture in Australia with BHP Billiton, the mining group said on Tuesday after a report that the deal could be terminated.

headline.main: Rio to Walk Away From $116 Billion BHP Venture?
